item.title: Brain scientists are seeking weight-loss drugs without the nausea
item.description: Weight-loss drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound often cause nausea and other side effects. Brain scientists are looking for ways to solve this problem.

item.title: This weekend, artists are speaking out across the country
item.description: Artists in more than 40 states are spending Friday and Saturday participating in the "Fall of Freedom" â€“ which they say represents a creative resistan...

item.title: Russian hacking suspect wanted by the FBI arrested on Thai resort island
item.description: Thai Police have arrested a suspected Russian hacker who is wanted by the FBI for alleged cyberattacks on U.S. and European government agencies.

item.title: What former ally did Trump call a 'ranting Lunatic' this week? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week, the quiz examines truth, drugs and scandal!

item.title: Rare earths: Federal backing and tech advances aim to help the U.S. catch up to China
item.description: Rare earths aren't all that rare. The real choke point is in processing and refining them, where China enjoys market dominance.
